Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory545.jpg'}
{3: 'The terminal has deciphered an identical Inver-Device schematic.'}
{3: 'The projection of the schematic hovers and spins silently as if mocking or pitying something.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: '...I really hate being manipulated around like this.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Besides this data, what else did you find?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Are they data walls constructed by computing power restraints?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'The computing power restraint is sealed from the outside in, while those "walls"...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: '...Are sealed from the inside out.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'From the inside out...', 3: '15'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I guess we're thinking about the same thing.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Any new progress on the "invitation"?', 3: '18'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'After you dove into the Gestalt, while monitoring, I managed to decrypt the section after Teddy unlocked the Conundrum data lock.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: "The codes weren't complex, but they were chaotically arranged with bizarre boundary condition judgments. I found similar code arrangements while searching the Science Council's internal database.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Do you still remember the "Full Sensory Simulation Device"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'It was left behind by Nanami...', 3: '23', 4: "I don't quite remember.", 5: '23'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'That was the "device" Nanami was working on back in Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "I've seen the complex spaghetti code she wrote, yet it somehow functioned perfectly.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'When she finished, some Science Council members got immensely attracted to her "device", which I could understand. In a time where most research focused on energy and weapons, the concept of "Full Sensory" was rarely ever mentioned.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'According to the experience report appended to the device, some researchers claimed to see "the color of words" after using it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'I always thought it was just her toy back then. But now...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Perhaps it really was just her toy.', 3: '29', 4: 'Maybe it\'s a "clue" she left behind.', 5: '30'}
{3: 'The gray-haired girl\'s bright smile comes to your mind. She never seemed like the type to deliberately do something so "serious".'}
{3: 'You recall Qu\'s expression when she handed you the "invitation". Somehow, you have a feeling that this would not be that simple.'}
{3: 'Which direction on the surface is she traveling now?'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Nanami hasn't reached out to us for quite some time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Next, I\'ll attempt to use the source code of the "Full Sensory Simulation Device" to reverse-engineer the final invitation.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Give me some of the work, will you?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Are you actually volunteering for such a troublesome task? Did something hack into your brain?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'I just want to know what exactly this Dominik is all about.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The name that she has admired and despised since childhood has now taken shape, transitioning from "fiction" to the real world.'}
{3: 'She has to see for herself what kind of existence lies behind that name.'}

{3: 'Teddy hears footsteps approaching. Using the shadow as a cover, she swiftly slips the memory module into her pocket. You also help to cover her action as Nikola briskly enters from the doorway.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: "How's the progress on the Inver-Device?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "The second version of the external interface model is stable. We're beginning to explore lateral expansion and considering enhancing its adaptability.", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: "The current model still demands a certain level of M.I.N.D. stability, but we can't estimate the actual risks of modifying the Inver-Device. Some uncertain data is still being verified.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: "There's another thing I need to tell you about Gray Raven... 【kuroname】, Liv and Lucia have gone missing in the Hetero Zone.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Everything seemed fine when you returned. The supplies should have been enough for them to take the refugees into the Clean Zone...'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'The Hetero Zone is continually expanding, and an unknown cause has led to satellite communication failures. To be precise—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "We've lost contact with all the squads conducting rescue and exploration missions in the Hetero Zone.", 4: '1'}
